pkgmetadata.longdescription: Resistome Predicter // This suite of packages is developed to predicts resistome for unknown chemical compounds. It utilizes two algorithms viz. deterministic model and stochastic model (manuscript under preparation) for the prediction of drug class. Once the drug class is predicted, the resistome profile of Escherichia coli and Pseudomonas aeruginosa for the drug class is fetched from the database.
